name: Brick Breaker - Notebook Version
description:
Brick Breaker - Notebook Version

it's basically the classic Brick Breaker game but with different theme! 

Controls :

  • Mouse                    : To move the paddle.
  • Mouse 1 / RMB : To launch the ball

Special Thanks :

  • Redafs Music for his free and interesting BGM 

I will update this game later!

Install instructions

1. Download the zip file

2. unzip file, and launch "Brick Breaker - Notebook Version.exe" to play

3. Have Fun!
